trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Coos Bay
There were no other sightings in Coos Bay on or around November 23rd 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi just got home and let the dog into the backyard which faces west. it was clear out. i love looking at the stars and looked up about 45 degrees due west. all of a sudden i thought i was watching a meteor. which is cool. it was heading north. it was near the normal jet traffic height and direction here on the coast. it was too fast for a jet. i noticed shortly after first noticing it that it had 5 white lights underneath it in a v or boomerang configuration. the lights were constant and not blinking. when it reached a northwestern position, it veared left or west in a gradual curve the vanished. this all happened in about a 30 second time span or less. it was perfectly quiet. i went in and told the wife about what i saw and thought i was nuts. i know what i saw. it was not a typical jet. it was not a meteor. it was not a satellite either. i've seen lots of all these things. i felt elated enough to write you guys. which i have never done. there was no time for a camera. it was just good timing and luck, i think. i'm 44 years old. married, quite sane and have lived here most of my life. i have a great eye for detail also. thank you for your time. hope this is of use.
